charges.charge_description: 18 USC 2113(a) and 2 BANK ROBBERY BY FORCE OR VIOLENCE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Term of imprisonment: 46 months on each of Counts 1 and 2, to run concurrently, and a term of 120 months on Count 3, to be served consecutively to the term imposed on Counts 1 and 2, for a total term of 166 months. 3 years supervised release on each of Counts 1, 2, and 3, all such terms to run concurrently. $300 special assessment fee.

charges.charge_description: 18 USC 2113(d) and 2 BANK ROBBERY, ASSAULT WITH A DEADLY WEAPON(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Term of imprisonment: 46 months on each of Counts 1 and 2, to run concurrently, and a term of 120 months on Count 3, to be served consecutively to the term imposed on Counts 1 and 2, for a total term of 166 months. 3 years supervised release on each of Counts 1, 2, and 3, all such terms to run concurrently. $300 special assessment fee.
